info.title: Branches Domain
info.description: The Branches Domain deals with the management of customers of the employment agency, as well as their different branches.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting offset to start from. If none is given, this defaults to 0.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The max amount of items to retrieve. This should be a value between 1 and 1000 (inclusive). If none is given, this defaults to 1000

parameters.name: changesSince
parameters.description:
An optional datetime to be passed along. When passed, only items that have been changed since the given datetime are returned. The time should be passed as UTC.

Required dateformat: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sss

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the ID of the branch to get

patch.summary: Replace the data of a branch.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the branch to replace

schema.description: Please refer to the [JSON Patch](https://jsonpatch.com/) documentation for more details.

get.summary: Gets all document types that are available for branch documents.

schema.description: Please refer to the [JSON Patch](https://jsonpatch.com/) documentation for more details.

get.summary: Gets all contact persons for a specific customer.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: The Customer identifier to get the contact persons for

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The number of entries to fetch at a time

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset of the entries to begin looking at

get.summary: Retrieves all different types of contact persons.

patch.summary: Replace the data for a specific customer.

schema.description: Please refer to the [JSON Patch](https://jsonpatch.com/) documentation for more details.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting offset to start from. If none is given, this defaults to 0.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The max amount of items to retrieve. This should be a value between 1 and 1000 (inclusive). If none is given, this defaults to 1000

get.summary: Get a single customer assignment by its id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the ID of the department to get

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the ID of the position to get

parameters.name: positionId
parameters.description: the ID of the position to get

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
the date of the staffrequirement

Required dateformat: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the ID of the team to get

id.description: The unique identifier of the document type

name.description: A descriptive name of the document type

archived.description: Whether or not the document type is archived. When it is archived, it should not be used anymore for new documents

defaultPublic.description:
Whether or not the document type is public by default. When it is public by default, new documents with this
type will be public by default.

id.description: The internal Plan4Flex ID of the status. We use this ID to link to the status in Plan4Flex.

name.description:
An arbitrary name for the status. Max length of 50 characters.
            
Note that a user can change this, so don't use this as a key.

isPlannable.description:
Whether or not it is possible to create new plans for a branch with this status. If false, it is not possible
to create new plans for a branch with this status.

exportCode.description: An optional code for third parties to identify the status. Max length of 50 characters.

BranchStatus.description: The current status of a branch

id.description: The unique identifier of the branch.

customerId.description: The id of the customer that this branch belongs to.

ouId.description: The id of the OU that this branch is assigned to.

statusId.description: The id of the status of the branch.

cocNumber.description:
The Chamber of Commerce number of the branch.
The exact implementation of this field depends on the country of the branch.

vatNumber.description:
The VAT number of the branch.
The exact implementation of this field depends on the country of the branch.

bankAccountNumber.description: The bank account number of the branch.

importId.description: A field to be used for importing data from third party systems.

costCenter.description: A division or project to which costs can be specifically allocated.

contactPersonId.description: The id of the contact person of the branch.

changedAt.description: The UTC date and time when the branch was last changed.

id.description: The unique identifier of the contact person.

customerId.description: The customer that this contact person belongs to.

firstName.description: The first name of the contact person.

lastName.description: The last name of the contact person.

middleName.description: The middle name of the contact person.

initials.description: The initials of the contact person.

emailAddress.description: The email address of the contact person.

dateOfBirth.description: When the contact person was born.

mobilePhoneNumber.description: The mobile phone number of the contact person.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the contact person.

comments.description: Optional comments about the contact person.

position.description: The position of the contact person within their organization.

genderId.description: The id of the gender of the contact person.

typeId.description: The id of the type of the contact person.

isDefault.description: Whether or not this contact person is the default contact person for the customer.

exportCode.description: An optional code for third parties to identify the contact person.

importId.description: An optional id for third parties to identify the contact person.

isPlanningContactPerson.description: If true, this contact person should be used for contact when the subject is about planning.

archived.description: Whether or not this contact person is archived. If archived, this contact person will not be used anymore.

preferredCommunicationLanguageId.description: The preferred communication language of the contact person.

ContactPerson.description: A person that can be contacted when a customer needs to be contacted.

id.description: The unique identifier of the contact person type.

name.description: The name of the contact person type.

fileName.description: The name of the file. This should not be empty, and include a file extension.

entityId.description:
The id of the entity this document belongs to. This can be an employee, a branch, etc. depending on the endpoint
used to create the document.

documentTypeId.description: The ID of the document type

createdDate.description: The date the document was created. If null, the current date will be used.

expirationDate.description: The date the document expires. If null, the document will not expire.

description.description: An optional description of the document

isPublic.description:
Whether the document is public. If true, the document can be viewed by employees. If false, the document can only
be viewed by the employment agency. If not set, the default value of the document type will be used.

data.description: The binary data of the document file.

CreateBranchDocument.description: DTO for creating a branch document

id.description: The unique identifier of the customer.

Customer.description: Customer refers to a customer of the employment agency.

id.description: The unique identifier of the customer assignment.

name.description: The name of the customer assignment.

customerId.description: The customer this assignment belongs to.

CustomerAssignment.description: Refers to an assignment (request) from a customer to the employment agency.

id.description: The unique identifier of the customer request.

status.description: The id of the customer that this branch belongs to.

CustomerRequest.description: A request from a customer for an x amount of staff.

id.description: The unique identifier of the department.

name.description: The name of the department. Can be "<internal>" if Data.Branch.Grpc.Interface.Dto.Department.Visible is  false.

branchId.description: The id of the branch that this department belongs to.

validFrom.description: The start date from which this department is active.

validUntil.description: The end date until which this department is active.

visible.description:
This value denotes if the department is visible to the enduser or not.

If Data.Branch.Grpc.Interface.Dto.Department.Visible is false,
Data.Branch.Grpc.Interface.Dto.Department.Name will be "<internal>".

costCenter.description: A division or project to which costs can be specifically allocated.

contactPersonId.description: The id of the contact person of the department.

Department.description: A department is a subset of a branch.

errors.description: Errors that occurred during the request

trace.description: The trace id of the request, we can use this to trace the request through the system

ErrorResponse.description: The standard error response for the API

total.description: The total amount of items that can be paginated over.
The total amount of items that can be paginated over.

id.description: The unique identifier of the position.

name.description: The name of the position. Can be "<internal>" if Data.Branch.Grpc.Interface.Dto.Position.Visible is  false.

teamId.description: The id of the team that this position belongs to.

validFrom.description: The start date from which this position is active.

validUntil.description: The end date until which this position is active.

visible.description:
This value denotes if the team is visible to the enduser or not.

If Data.Branch.Grpc.Interface.Dto.Position.Visible is false,
Data.Branch.Grpc.Interface.Dto.Position.Name will be "<internal>".

costCenter.description: A division or project to which costs can be specifically allocated.

contactPersonId.description: The id of the contact person of the position.

Position.description: A position is a subset of a team.

positionId.description: The unique identifier of the position.

StaffRequest.description: A request for x amount of employees for a certain date.

date.description: The UTC date and time when this staff requirement is needed/valid.

positionId.description: A position is a subset of a team.

StaffRequirements.description: A StaffRequirements is a request for x amount of staff.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team.

name.description: The name of the team. Can be "<internal>" if Data.Branch.Grpc.Interface.Dto.Team.Visible is  false.

departmentId.description: The id of the department that this team belongs to.

validFrom.description: The start date from which this team is active.

validUntil.description: The end date until which this team is active.

visible.description:
This value denotes if the team is visible to the enduser or not.

If Data.Branch.Grpc.Interface.Dto.Team.Visible is false,
Data.Branch.Grpc.Interface.Dto.Team.Name will be "<internal>".

costCenter.description: A division or project to which costs can be specifically allocated.

contactPersonId.description: The id of the contact person of the team.

Team.description: A team is a subset of a department.

Bearer.description: The authorization header. This should be passed with value "bearer <token>". The token can be obtained through the Users Domain. See also the Getting Started page.

tags.name: CustomerAssignment
tags.description: The Customer Assignment controller, refers to Opdrachtgever Opdracht in Plan4Flex.
